content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting in our backyard on july 3rd. it was a very clear sky. at around 9:50 some fireworks went off in the distance and my husband and i saw something fly by out of the corner of our eye and i said it was probably a seagull scared of the fireworks. about 15 or so minutes later i saw a delta shaped craft with 3 lights on the bottom fly overhead between our house and the neighbors house. i told my husband to look up. he saw it just as it crossed over our house and we could see as it flew over our yard and out of sight because of a tall hedge behind our house. it came from the west flying due east at a very constant speed. it flew towards nisene marks park in the santa cruz mountains and came from the direction of the monterey bay. it was flying faster than a cesna plane would fly and it was completely silent. when i first saw it i knew it was nothing i had seen before. it wasn't a plane, a kite or a remote control type thing. it was flying fast and very direct and made no sound. the 3 lights on each corner where big and glowed. we could also see that it was a solid object. we felt perplexed as to what we just saw. we knew we had just seen something very out of the norm. we'd love to know what exactly it was.
we've gone outside a few nights since but haven't seen anything. it also been foggy at night a lot since then.
content.summary: While sitting in our backyard we saw a delta shaped craft with 3 lights fly over our house. it came from the west and flew towards the east.

content.detailedDescription:
Suddenly the site went down and i could no longer view recent reports.
then i heard a rumor that some dude named bigalow had bought? the data base?.
 i'm confident i know more about the aliens/gods that live among us than most people do. and in the past i have shared some of the experiences that i've had with them with the mufon community (hope you found them entertaining), i won't be doing that anymore.
content.summary: Heard a rumor about somthing suspicious going on at mufon

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my truck down hickery hammock road on my way home from work,a quarter mile from my street i observed bright lights about a half of a mile ahead of me in the middle of the road ,after getting closer it looked like a circus tent and opon getting closer the shape of pyrmird became more visable to me.They were shaped like three pyrmirds with mirrors and glowing lights outlineing the objects.Two were hovering in the road about five feet above the road and the third was hovering about sixty to seventy feet to the right above the powerlines .My feelings during the encounter was at awl,i couldnt beleave what i was seeing and tried to figure out what it could be in the middle of no where .I then texted friends and family and them of my sighting ,four of whom beleive me . i then drew pictures of what i had seen .I lost sight of the objects when a on coming car was coming toward me behind them,before the car got to close to them they vanished through thin air,like cutting off a light switch.
content.summary: Three perfect pyrmirds surrounded by lights ,two hovered in the middle of the road ,and one hovered over the power lines to the far right of my veiw

content.detailedDescription: While driving from bristol tn. to kingsport tn, on a country road, we were starteld by a bright flash of light in the sky some 100 ft in front of us and 50 to 75 ft of of the ground. the lights never focused on us but slowley moved from right to left in a jerkong way that looked like it was one place and then in an instant it was forward or backward of the original position. we pulled off the road and watch it for about 15 minutes until it went off in the distance. just as were pulling back onto the road several helecopters went in the same path as the lights did.
content.summary: Red and white lights moveing in a straight line ,jumping back and forth

content.detailedDescription:
I was taken to some other galaxy in this whirlwind that i was initially afraid of. i then was in this examining room where these embryo like creatures in suits were examining me. i had some ectoplasm thing attached to my mouth and they asked me if i smoked. i said yes, and they made me smoke a cigarrette through this ectoplasm like thing attached to my mouth. they then seemed to concentrate on my right foot. now, the only thing i have in my right foot is this infection in my great toenail after having slammed my foot in a door  quite a few years back, 
then i was taken to this open area where there were hundreds of people all walking around. i thought i was dead and it was quite cold and my body felt very heavy. i was also greeted by one of the creatures by a hand signal that i could not imitate. i saw housing installations but they had a sort of flexibility to them that i can not explain. 
i was again taken back to the exam rom and was given some liquid to drink, but i drank too much and they had to keep me longer for observation because of it. next thing i know, i am back in bed and i felt as though i had just awoken from anesthesia. my face and body felt all tingly and weird and i couldn't stop touching my face for quite a while afterwards. dn't know what happened here, but i have seen many things in the sky in arizona before with missing time and migraines after sightings.
content.summary: Alien abduction in arizona

content.detailedDescription: I was on a float trip with my friend who is 15yrs old and her mom.  we went outside about 9:00pm to look at the stars and my friends mom yelled "what is that!" we saw these bright balls of light spinning over the trees.  there were 4 or five of them that we could see, the tree line was in the way.  the lights were yellowish/orange, hovering, and spinning very fast.
content.summary: 4 to 5 yellowish/orange balls of light spinning over the trees across the street from our hotel in the distance.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home then i had a tex from my daughter that ther was a ufo in the sky so i went outside and i saw it .It was very colorful it was hovering then it took off really fast .I live about two blocks from my daughters house .
content.summary: Disc shape very colorful

content.detailedDescription: In the spring of 1968 i was assembling a car engine on the patio behind the house. small house and no garage.It was around midnight and under two 150 watt floodlights. i had that odd feeling of being watched and looked toward my neighbors homes. i assumed that they were not happy with me making noise outside at midnight. understandable of course. i looked at the one story building across the ditch at the end of my backyard and something caught my eye. an object seemed to be over the building about 200 feet above it. a moon-less night made the glare of the flood lights rather intense so i walked up the steps and turned off the lights in no hurry. i turned the lights off to appease my neighbors and not because i really thought that something was hovering over a building behind my house at midnight. that idea seemed pretty unlikely to me. but it was there. it remained motionless long enough for my eyes to adjust to the dark and to see it reasonably well from the lights in the parking lot of the g.E.S.Store. the object was approximately 65 feet long and 15 feet thick and shaped like a pressed medicine capsule with a flat ridge around the circumferance. after about a minute of observation the object rose vertically to an altitude of 500 feet and made a random series of right angle turns. imagine a school bus that is 700 feet from you, going 100 miles per hour and making right angle turns. i am not a physicist but i do know that making right angle turns at 100 mph(several turns were much faster and 180 degrees) is not possible. it was as surreal as watching a disney cartoon. at that point i had that strange taste in my mouth of being utterly helpless. the object left at an oblique angle and rapidly disappeared into the night sky. my outlook of what is and is not was forever changed. i saw an object, in the air, executing directional changes that are absolutely impossible. the vehicle would fly apart and any occupants would immediately be crushed. the instantaneous g loads would be beyond astronomical. i was then, and remain, very skeptical. impossible- but i saw it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object made several physicaly impossible right angle turns and rapidly flew away.

content.detailedDescription:
This happened a long time ago so my recollection of specific details is a little fuzzy.  i was walking home traveling northbound on 26th ave. west between 12th and 13th st. i looked at my watch, it was exactly 12:25 am then something made me look up at the sky like i could sense a presence.  i saw a white oval shaped craft.  it appeared to be hovering over me until i looked right at it and it took off at what i would say was light speed.  it was traveling the same direction that i was walking then specked out.  what i though was interesting was the fact that as it took off, a skunk walked out of the bushes on the side of the road and walked along side of me all the way to my house and kept going.  like it was more afraid of the object in the sky than it was of me.  i've never been so happy to see a skunk.  i saw the object again when i arrived at my house, now at 12:35am.  it seemed to be following me and hovering then it took off again when i looked up at it.  
the second time i saw it i was traveling south bound and it was also traveling south bound.  it was startling.  i didn't tell anyone about it for several years.  
i saw your case file about (name removed) this afternoon and the polygraph was a technical disappointment but i believe that due to the trauma of his experience, he may have wanted to block it out of his mind and that is why his answers seemed to fail the test. it was just too much.  his life was simple and happy before the experience.  it tore him up.  my experience was nothing in comparison to his and it still bothers me sometimes.
content.summary: I looked up and saw it, then it warped out.

content.detailedDescription: 2:35 a.M. july 29th, 2011, dallas county, texas. my brother, a friend and myself were on the front porch when i looked to the east and noticed something that seemed completely out of place. it was brighter than a star or a planet and it seemed to be pulsating and hovering. commercial aircraft flies overhead regularly and it was much larger and higher altitude. i brought it to my brother and friend's attention and we began watching it closely. it seemed to drift and then hover and then pulse. when it was obvious that it wasn't a plane or a planet(i used my skyview iphone application to debunk any planets around or visible... there weren't any visible in that area) we went and got our binoculars and realized it had a specific shape. a triangular shape with at least 3-5 distinct circular orb like shapes at each point with what looked like electrical current running between all the points. i began taking zoomed in pictures with my iphone and then grabbed my expensive zoom lens canon camera and rapidly took about 302 photographs. for some reason my cell phone battery went from 88% to 18% within a matter of 15 minutes. this also affected my friend's cell phone battery power as well. it increased in size and rapidly pulsed and while i was watching it thru the binoculars it seemed like 3 other craft split from the center leaving the original object less pulsating and only white light... the other three objects had the spectrum of light in a pattern and were darting to various points and hovering with the colored lights pulsating in a pattered around each craft. the shape of the original object seemed to change as well and become more of a disk like shape. the other 3 objects with colored lights were boomerang shaped. we drove at least 20 miles east to rockwall, texas's lake ray hubbard. we parked and continued to watch the objects but they decreased in size and weren't pulsating as much as before. by5:30am they seemed to be gone.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright luminous light brighter than a star/planet objects splitting from core with various colored lights rainbow spectrum random patterns pulsating hovering drifting

content.detailedDescription: It was just prior to deer season, my hunting buddies went to town to hang out, hunter new york, and let me out at my request at a point between blackhead and roundtop mountains so i could hunt bobcat.  where they let me out i marked the side of the road with a pile of stones and proceeded into the woods heading into an area called devils canyon.  i only went approx. 100 yards toward the canyon when i came to a clearing.  when i was at the edge of the clearing i saw a large object in the center.  i asked myself why would anybody put a building in and isolated place like this?  i crouched down at the edge of the clearing and checked out this (building).  upon further examination i evaulated what i saw.  what i saw was a landed flying saucer the bottom of which was mostly flat only curving up thward the outer edges.  it was about 8 feet over the ground, i could only observe 2 landing legs, the thlird one had to be on the other side. i then saw 2 very tall what appeared to be olmost stick figures who were communicating with each other. i could not hear what they were saying nor did i see any facial details. they were at the far end of the craft.  this craft had a band of dull lights about 12" high and each color segment was about 24" wide the colors blended into each other, violet, orange, blue, green and all colors that may come out of a prism.  there was a low but audable humm coming from the ship. the top half of the craft had a small dome about 2' high x 3' wide, what strucck me as odd was that it was not centered on top but toward one end. the entire craft was about 12' top to bottom.  i spent about 15 to 20 min. taking all this in.  i then heard a click and saw what was a walkway coming out of the center of the ship, it stopped and a third figure came down to the ground and walked over to the other 2 figures, the 3 communicatd and the one that come down pointed right at me where i was hidind at the edge of the clearing. one stood there one went left and one went right.  they were in the process of surrounding me.  i decided it was time to go. i had an 8mm mauser with me, put it on 1/2 safe and backed up the way i came in. i hid in the culvert in the side of the road.
content.summary: Came upon a landed craft in a field with 2 occupants outside

content.detailedDescription:
Driving along rt 29 south toward rt 309, when i noticed a bunch of unexplainable orange lights hovering.  i kept looking out driver side window repeating to myself "what is that" after reaching open area next to dallas high school sign they were gone from my sight due to tree cover.

looked just like balls from fayetville show but about 1,000 feet up and twenty not three.
content.summary: 20ish glowing orange balls too high and stationary to be explained

content.detailedDescription: I was staying at my grandma's house in the summer of 1988 in columbia, mo. the bed was by the window and i had a great view of the night sky and could see the stars.  one night three lights in a triangular formation appeared in my view.  they stayed in the same spot in the sky, however the lights would rotate and switch positions while in this spot in the sky. the lights were larger than the stars, but i could see the night sky through and around the lights.  the fact that there was no structure to be seen was really curious. the lights never blinked and did not move across the sky like the stars do. the most remarkable aspect of this was seeing the lights rotate and switch positions so fast and high up in the sky. i witnessed this for three nights in a row, and then one night they were not there. however they returned the night after.  i called my mom in to take a look. i remember it scared her and she closed the blind to my window, but she does not recall this memory.  what is even more curious, is that nearly 20 years later a friend of mine i had met while living in delaware told of a sky anomaly she had seen back in the late eighties. she described the same thing i had seen in missouri, only she remembers the year as 1989 and she saw them near newark, de during the summer. i saw the lights a year earlier in missouri.  i haven't seen these lights since and have tried to research what it could have been.  i'm sure there are others who have seen the same thing as my friend and i did over 20 years ago and half a continent away from each other. if you have any information on this, i would love to know!
content.summary: 3 lights in triangle formation, larger and closer than stars. lights would rotate and switch positions while staying in triangular formation. night sky was seen through and around the triangle. happened for several nights in a row.

content.detailedDescription: Was walking across the street to the store from work on a break. walking and facing the north northwest, a flying source that resembled a shooting star caught my eye. it was approx 930 in twilight and the sighting was atthe point where the pink sky of the sunset met the greenish blue. the flight of the object seemed to fly in the same direction i was walking, north northwest. the trail of the light was about 6 inches in view and the light seemed to disappear, extremely fast in tothe distance, rather than burning out or flicker out. the timeframe from the point it caught my eye to its disappearance was maybe 2 seconds no longer. also the sighting was above the treeline and no building or object obstructed any view of its path
content.summary: Extremely fast shooting star like object had surface in front of tailing llight

content.detailedDescription: At around 1:30 a.M. on august 5, 2011, i was letting my dogs out one last time before i went to bed. i was looking at the sky (out in rural ohio, you can see every star) to see if there were any meteor showers. in the corner of my eye, a small red and white flashing light caught my attention. it appeared to be small, so i thought it could have been a helicopter. as i stared at it, i noticed it was hovering slightly, so i discounted it as a helicopter. i then continued to look at. then, my dogs began barking for no apparent reason, and i noticed the flashing light was actually moving towards my house. i hid on the side of the house, out of the object's view. when i looked again, the light was hovering about ten feet away from over the driveway, and about 20 feet in the air. i was paralyzed with adrenaline and fear as it started slowly ascending back into the sky to the position it began in. i did not want to try and take a picture with my cell phone, fearing it would light up my face and the object would see me. i went inside to retrieve my sister so she could see the object in its original position. we brought the binoculars, and looked at the object. it appeared blurry, but still flashing. then we noticed there were two other small and white flashing lights located in a line formation across the street from us in a field. those too were also hovering and appeared high up in the sky. we have seen these three blinking lights in the summertime for the past 5 years, but never has one come over to our house. the next night we went out to see them, and they were not present. on august 10, 2011, we were able to see the flashing lights over the field again.
content.summary: A red and flashing light over a tree. as i stared at it, it came within 15 feet of me, and about 20 feet off the ground.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my boyfriend were floating in the pool and he noticed something in the sky...It 1st looked like something on fire..It decended very slowly, which is when i got out of pool to grab my camera....When i came back out it had changed direction and was slowly ascending away....At the closest point to me it appeared to be three balls of light.  my picture only shows two of the balls of light.  after seeing this and having no clue as to what it was, my boyfriend called the news in philadelphia who had not had any reports of anything that we described...The only thing that they were aware of was a helicopter in thorofare nj looking fo a suspet...This was not a helicopter and the direction was not towards thorofare nj. 

when viewing the attached pic begin to zoom in and its in the bottom left..I have 2 or 3 other pics but i can not find it in the pic...I have no clue how to crop it while enlarged so that you can see it better..Please feel free to contact me if you need more info
content.summary: Observed 3 ball of light descend and then ascend in the sky

content.detailedDescription: i was alone, driving up southington mountain (meriden rd) toward waterbury at 7:46 pm on march 1, 2011 i noticed 4 green unblinking lights through the treetops to the left of me. the area is very wooded and the trees are quite tall.  the object passed above the treetops over the road almost directly above my car.  it was descending.  at first i thought it was a plane crashing.  i heard no sound, but my radio was on.  when it past over the road, i realized that the lights were in the center square on the underside of a huge object. i only saw it clearly for about 2-3 seconds. i believe the object was rectangular and was gray/black and completely non-reflective.  if the lights were not there, i don't think i would have noticed it. it blended with the night sky. i could still glimpse the lights through the trees on the other side of the road for about 2 seconds more.  i drove to the top of the hill and pulled into a parking lot but did not see it again.  i did notice a plane in that direction while sitting in the parking lot. i checked ufo websites throughout march and noticed that there were two other sightings at the exact time, one in waterbury and the other in meridan.
content.summary: 3/1/2011 7:46 pm huge rectangular object 4 unblinking green lights set squarely in center of underside.

content.detailedDescription: Very reflective metalic surface. slow moving. cigar shaped. disappeared immediately after about a 30 second sighting.
content.summary: Moved slowly in a straight path. very reflective. no lights. disappeared immediately.

content.detailedDescription:
It was sometime in 2002, in the fall or early winter since it was mostly dark around 5:30-6pm mountain time.

i was walking my bike home from work, did not own a car at the time, it was uphill on a bike path in boulder, colorado. it was fairly dark or just after dusk. 

i like to stargaze, so when i was walking i was looking up every now and then. i have done this since childhood.

i noticed a really dark spot against the sky moving from north to south. i know it was n to s because i was facing the mountains, they are to the west. 

at first i looked away, i don't know why. i didn't really think it was anything i guess. i looked back up and at this point it was almost directly above me. i could definitely make out a triangle shape with very defined edges. there were no lights. there was no sound. no detail could be seen, just a plain very black triangle shape. it moved quickly at a constant rate of speed, but not that much faster than a normal airplane i guess. it seemed like it was only a few thousand feet above me, but i really couldn't determine the distance. 

it kept going in a straight line and i lost sight as it continued to the south, behind tress, houses, etc. 

i felt nothing when i saw it or right after the "event". i almost convinced myself i didn't see anything and i didn't tell anyone for a few weeks. it seemed like a non-event to me at first, like it was just supposed to be flying by, like there's nothing unusual about it at all.
 it was flying over boulder, a decent size city in colorado, so i figured it might be military.  

also, i was in a dark area on the bike path looking up at the sky. if i was in a normally well-lit area there's almost no way i could've seen it. under a street light you can't see very far into the night sky and wouldn't have been able to see the stars either, and especially not a black object passing in front of them. 

that's it. no idea what it was, not convinced it wasn't military since it didn't do anything weird. who knows.
content.summary: Dusk sky, very dark triangle, no lights, went in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription:
As reported by phone to asd: witness age 33 

aug 8 and 9 at 10:18 pm. both nights - clinton, mo: the witness saw a bright glowing white light��� ese of his position halfway over the first bridge over lake of the ozarks south of clinton on highway 13. he slammed on the breaks because he thought something was exploding. this is at the montrose exit, and he was headed north on highway 13.  the object was on the east side of the bridge. a second smaller light appeared below it then slowly moved into the one above it. it looked like the second light was gathering light below it. it then just disappeared and was no longer visible. he said that the object color looked like a white florescent bulb. 

it was at the same height just above tree level on both nights.  there were a  few trees in the way when he first saw it, and as he drove by it popped out into clear view.  there was a big storm with lots of lighting that looked like a tesla coil with static electricity pouring from the clouds, and he thought that the light was related to the lighting.  it would take a nickel at arm���s length to cover the object. 

aug 9 at 10:18 pm the same thing appeared, but it was ene from his location further south on the highway, on the second bridge south of clinton on highway 13.  was over the water this night.  this time the same thing happened with the smaller light forming then going into the larger ball of light. there were clear skies on that night with no clouds or lighting. 

he said he got the strange feeling like ���the boogey man is real,��� and that the experience has changed his view of reality. 

note: his parents are truck drivers.  his mother told one of her friends about it and he sais that he saw a white light coming towards him while he was driving in the area in the past few days,  the light stopped, made a right angle turn, then it went up in the sky and disappeared.  he lives in boliver, mo 

ricky told some of his co-workers about his sightings and most of them laughed at him, but one man said that while he did not believe in ufos, he did see something strange recently. he and his buddy were fishing one night on the lake (no date given) and they saw a big ball of white light and 6 smaller lights came out of it, they shot away very quickly, then returned to join with the larger light.  a lot of people he works with in clinton say they are seeing strange things more often.  

he and his son often watch the stars at night.  some time ago they saw an orange light appear at 60 degrees off the horizon, in the same direction as the lake.  he was living in oceola at the time and it was north of there.  they also watched lots of ���stars��� moving across the sky, but thought that was odd, too.  

he grew up in anton kentucky, outside madisonville, around coal mines. there were lots of truck drivers in the area and he played with the cb radio often.  when he was a kid he and his mother saw white lights go down in the trees one night and got several drivers and security guards to watch the lights, too.  one night they saw bright orange bars in the sky just above the trees.  the bars were sized small to large and shaped in a perfect circle.  his mother made him go inside the house so he did not see it leave the area. 

i have attached a google map of the area with the approximate location of the objects.
content.summary: Glowing ball of white light hoovering over lake of the ozarks on two nights

content.detailedDescription: These  fly over us all. mine do not let me sleep.Doctors will call it hearing voices. these can not be seen due to the technology they have on thier ships to become invisible. some gaurdian angels are bad.Mine,i cant get them to shut up. they take turns talking to me since 2006. to help me and all others havein this problem with thier gardian angels need to know medications are not the answer. medications cause stoke and heart attacks.The answer is to contact our creator in person or christ.This is done by telling others if you die tell the real lords to come to you in person since bad angels lie to you and worse. i am needing some one that reads this to go on t.V. with this message...To all that die tell the lords to come see me in person so to stop this and pay me back what my angels took from me as with job.The lords(lord thy god the creator, and lord jesus christ my savior,they will make it right with me.
content.summary: These are over us all, psalms 91v.11inships with tecnology to become invisible

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a car, while someone was driving me, and i took my cmaera to see the sights of philly.

then, i looked up into the sky, and i saw a huge light, i thought at first it was a star, or the moon. then, i noticed the light grew brighter, and it started to move in a circular motion, like a ball going down a solid whirlpool. 

i felt really scared, and excited at the same time, because i didn't know what it was, or if it was gonna come closer to me. as we drove away, the object started to pulsate, and then fade away.
content.summary: A ufo spun in a circular manner, fading and appearing..

content.detailedDescription: During the perseid meteor shower i was on my lunch break in a dark area near my job watching the meteor shower. when i was steering at a bright light which according to google sky was jupiter when i notice a light which actually looked like a star was moving north.. at 1st i thought it was a plane but there werre no blinking lights so i watched it pass by the bright light (jupiter) it didn't pass in front and as it passed by more stars it was as if it was cloaked because the stars it passed by didnt blink out. i watched it for about 5min till i went out of sight
content.summary: Saw it during perseid meteor shower

content.detailedDescription: These ships are found in the bible.The ones n the ships or angels,psalms 91,v.11,which reads "he shall give angels charge over you"these go undetected by technology that makes thier ships invisible.Look up invisibility on the computer.It will tell you how to make objects invisible.Look up teleportation.It is done by changing the magnetic field around a object.Look up a book called the makers diet by jordan s. rubin.Jordan was healed by theses over him.
content.summary: They started taling to me in 2006

content.detailedDescription: I was headed to work this morning driving noth on stanton rd. approaching ramp to 166, lakewood (langford now) freeway.  to the west/northwest noticed bright lights over the distant treeline, maybe 35 degrees on the horizon.  i slowed down as i drove and saw it was apparently not moving.  then i stopped in the road so i could discern whether it was moving or not and it appeared to be drifting a bit to the south.  a vehicle approached from behind and i had to go ahead as the road is on the narrow side and there was no place i could pull onto the shoulder of the road.  as i pulled up to the red light at the ramp to go east on lakewood freeway, i glanced over my shulder and it was still there.  then, as i turned onto the ramp and was picking up speed, i glanced again and i saw 3 lights in same formation, but now less than half the former brightness, headed east by south east at some speed.  i can only assume this was the same object as i had not seen any other air traffic in the sky previously.  no sound was detected.  this gave me an uneasy feeling as whatever it was, it was not any familiar object and the lights werre brighter than on any regular airplane or helicopter.  at first glance, i thought maybe it could be the iss but it wasn't moving.  when i'd stopped to observe it, i could see it was definitely something "different".  there might be some explanation for it, maybe an early morning launch of a blimp but i could detect no shape behind the lights, appeared to be an irregular cluster of 3 bright lights, that is, the lights appeared to be in an unconventional triangular array and not uniformly spaced but i could see no framework.  maybe somebody at charlie brown airport could shed light on this - maybe they noticed something.  i couldn't really tell how far away it was , maybe a half mile.  not knowing the actual size of the object, it would be hard to say how high up it was, maybe as little as 1000 to 1500 ft.
content.summary: 3 brigth white lights in an irregular triangular configuration

content.detailedDescription:
I was a utility worker on a call in felda, florida.  i was leaving palm and pines mobile home park traveling south on sr 29 when i noticed a slow but big pulsating light over gopher ridge orange grove to the east.  the shadow cast by the light showed the underside of a square, box like structure moving very slowly from south to north.  my view was quick, but as i thought about it on the way home, i knew there are no known man made objects that travel or resemble what i'd just saw.
the light was bowl shaped, white and pulsed at a rate too slow for aircraft id lights.
the altitude of the vehicle never varied and the flight path was straight and due south/north.
i can't estimate the size of the craft, but it was certainly bigger and slower (and stranger) than anything man can build.
content.summary: Not a helicopter, blimp, or other known slow moving aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
2. what made you first notice the object?
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
6. how did you lose sight of the object?




1. smoking on break
2. watching the horizon/sky/clouds
3. thought it was a plane/ both 
4. one reflective line/cigar/cylinder in sky ahead of the other. the one closest to me sped up ahead quickly, thats how i knew it wasnt plane. a star like light descended not far from the 2nd cigar/line and disappeard & about a minute/ 2 minutes later another star like light descended, got really bright and then faded/disappeared. both star like lights were near the rear of the 2nd object. both cigar/reflective lines disappeared rather quickly, once they were off in the distance. 
5. amazed, but the only time ive seen a cigar in the area. once seen one in a back parking lot area on a windy day. clouds were moving, had to fix my eyes on object and building siding slats to see if the object were moving & it wasnt. then finally it moved on. tried to call another witness to look, but they were busy on the job.
6. they both disappeared into the distance.
content.summary: 2 cigars/cylinders & 2 descending star like lights above & at end of 1 cigar/cylinder @ diff times

content.detailedDescription: Am at street level. opened the door and scanned sky with unaided eye as usual when i exit house in dark hours. saw a bright light unmoving for approximately 10  minutes. entered house and wrote this and at 0122 exited again and took pictures and entered house at 0123.
content.summary: Bright light.My arm at 120 deg. angle toward it.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my front porch watching my cats eat to make sure a racoon didn't steal their food. something in the sky caught my eye. it was a very bright stationary light in the northeastern sky. it sat still for about 30 seconds, then glowed brighter and got bigger. it dropped or ascended and left a slight trail making the whole thing look like a teardrop. i sat on the steps and watched the sky to see if i could see it again. about ten minutes later, in a more northerly direction, i saw the same thing again. it didn't go or travel there. it just appeared and stayed there bigger and brighter than any star. after about 30 to 45 seconds, it got bigger and brighter, then dropped leaving a trail as bright as the original object. the trail was not fainter than the object and it didn't fade out. it actually looked like part of the object more than a trail. when the object disappeared, the entire trail disappeared, too.
content.summary: 2 objects 10 minutes apart/glowed brightly then dropped and left a slight trail

content.detailedDescription: My mom and i were on the way back from looking at the church where i would be getting married at later in the year. around 9:00 approximately, we were coming home and she said "oh my gosh, jodi look over there, what is that?" so, she pulled over and there was this object hovering over a patch of trees about half a mile away from us or so.  we got out of the car to look and she asked me if we were really seeing something and i said i'm not sure what it is. it was just hovering there over the tope of the trees and it had these giant red lights. they were not blinking, but were just on. it was stationary. all at once, just like a domino effect, one by one, these lights started to turn off from one side to the next. i feel like we only say one side of this craft. i am not sure what shape it was because i really believe we only saw the back of it or whatever side it was. then, it was just gone. that's it. it just disappeared.  no noise, no nothing.   it happened to be over my place of employent at the time and knowing the area well, we decided to drive over by there to see if we could see it. nothing at all. there is a big herd of cattle, and they seemed undisturbed and we saw no signs of anything. it know it was around the same time as the sightings in millstadt over by scott air force base. i'm not sure if anyone else saw this thing. i've never really told many people about it, because they just say it was a cell phone tower light. i'm sorry, but no it was not. i just want to know if anyone else saw anything. it's been bothering me for years, but now maybe someone else will see this and tell their story too.
content.summary: Saw a huge craft with red lights that never blinked, then it disappeared.
